unit_rules.name: Braziers of Judgement
unit_rules.text: While a +Character+ is leading this unit, attacks against this unit have -1 to the Hit roll.

unit_rules.name: Emnity for the Unworthy
unit_rules.text: Attacks made by this unit against a +Character+ unit have +1 to the Hit roll.

unit_rules.name: Wrath of the First
unit_rules.text: Add +1 to the Hit roll of attacks made against your army's Oath of Moment target.
